info.name: final-kimtaky
info.description:
This collection tests the API specification for the final project of CS493-2020Spr.
In order to run this collection, it has 4 environment variables pre-defined:

app_url
- Set this to your app. E.g., when running locally set it to http://localhost:8080. When running the app on GCP. set it to https://myapp.appsport.com

invalid_shelf_id
- I have set it to 1.


invalid_product_id
-  I have set it to 1.

invalid_token
- I have set if a part of old token. 

Also, it have set 4 variables for a user to insert in the environment: jwt1, jwt2, user_id1, and user_id2.
A user should input their token from the Google for jwt1 and jwt2.
As for the user ids, it doesn't do anything with this applications.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["Error"]).to.eq("The request object should have four attributes");
